name: aurumjs
description: Fast and concise declarative DOM rendering library for javascript

scripts.deploy-test: npm run build && microbundle --no-compress --entry dist/aurum.js --output prebuilt --name aurum
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run generateDocs && microbundle --no-compress --entry dist/aurum.js --output prebuilt --name aurum && microbundle --entry dist/aurum.js --output prebuilt_minified --name aurum
